Text: @tariro I always think of Campari/aperol as aperitifs and amaro as digestifs. Interesting

Name: TMTanalyst
Text: @tariro Great article but a negroni doesn’t have amaro. A classic negroni is gin, sweet vermouth and Campari. There… https://t.co/Hlt3dgscE7
clean_text: @TARIRO GREAT ARTICLE NEGRONI DOESNT AMARO CLASSIC NEGRONI GIN SWEET VERMOUTH CAMPARI
